scripts.build: next build --turbopack && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src='.next/static';const dest='.next/standalone/apps/web/.next/static';fs.cpSync(src,dest,{recursive:true});const pubSrc='public';const pubDest='.next/standalone/apps/web/public';if(fs.existsSync(pubSrc))fs.cpSync(pubSrc,pubDest,{recursive:true});"
